# Check out the packages!

The image below shows the core `tidyverse` packages, and what part of the data science process each of them fits into.


![](/post/2019-10-09-hello-and-welcome_files/tidyverse-3.0.jpg){width=90% height=90%}

For a full list of all the packages, check out the code chunk below. 
```{r tidyverse_packages}

```
